page.title: 19PLANS FOR THE AREA (contd)
page.content: Station will be filled in gradually with waste leaving small hills. This area will be planted to encourage wild life and an informal Country Park will be formed. An area in the west, nearest to the houses of the Port Tennant area will be used for Playing Fields, providing four pitches plus cricket squares and courts, as well as changing facilities and a car park. This infill area will be bordered by belts of trees. Beyond this will be the wild and undisturbed area of the Bog which will be a Nature Reserve. The Tennant Canal and Basin area will be waterscaped to expose more water and attreacy waterfowl.
